page.title: 20Leisure, Cannock Chase
page.content: Within our area, Cannock Chase offers superb leisure facilities; with its guided woodland walks, open spaces and Visitor Centre for families to use freely and cheaply. Marquis Drive Visitor Centre offers an interesting collection of information ranging from historical matters to local landmarks. The nearby Deer Museum and Shooting Butts Studies Centre contain information about local wild life. Silver Trees Caravan Park offers a facility for visitors to holiday and enjoy the countryside. Hagley Park and Fair Oak Secondary Schools also offer a wide range of leisure activities for their pupils. ************************ {The Domesday Project work on Cannock Chase and Slitting Mill was written by the children and staff of Etching Hill C.E. Primary School, Rugeley, Staffs.}
